forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 12C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 52F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Low 8C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Low 46F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low around 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 18C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 64F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 5C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 41F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 50F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 43F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 43F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
